title: Block State Definitions
description: Definitions for block states that control texture variants or block rotations.

texture_variants.description: Texture-variating block state definitions, grouped by block shapes.

*.description: All block shapes will look at these texture-variating block state definitions.

^\\w+$.description: The specific block shape to apply these texture-variating block state definitions to.

^/.+/$.description: A regular expression matching block names to apply these texture-variating block state definitions to.

rotations.description: Block-rotating block state definitions, grouped by block shapes.

*.description: All block shapes will be affected by these block state rotation definitions.

^\\w+$.description: The specific block shape to apply these block state rotation definitions to.

#exclusive_add.description: Whether to only look at these variants, and add them together. Defaults to false.

^[\\w:]+$.description: Controls which texture variant is chosen based on the value of this block state.

items.description: The index of the texture variant in terrain_texture.json to use.

^\\w+$.description: The index of the texture variant in terrain_texture.json to use when the block state is this value.

^[\\w:]+$.description: Controls the entire block's rotation based on the value of this block state.

rotationTriplet.description: The XYZ rotation of the entire block (in degrees; applied in the order X-Y-Z) around its center.
